name: Skyku
description:
LUDUM DARE 32 - http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-32/?action=p...

POSTCOMP - http://gamejolt.com/games/puzzle/skyku/62606/

Bad situation, Try to make the best of it, Fight with haiku.

Construct a sentence, And then another two more, Use five, seven, five.

But not always though, Sometimes you just have small words, Do your best anyway.

Within the compo rules, But made by two of us both, Here's a game we made.

Check out the store to get new phrases, they refresh every time.

Each planet should have one challenge for you, just follow your compass!

Tweet your favourite haiku's to us @kabutakogames !

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move

E - Change destination

I, Tab, or Esc - Settings

Space - Toggle the store
